27.3 Rental of portable CCTV camera with recording function and other ancillaries (minimum of 4 hours-use per deployment)
CCTV technical specification
The minimum requirements for the CCTV camera to be provided are as below:
Full High Definition (FHD) 1080pixel, 25/30 frame per sec
Ingress Protection (IP) 66
Pan/Tilt/Zoom (PTZ); 10x Optical zoom
Able to operate under low light and night time condition (i.e. 0.01 Lux and with Infrared technology)
Battery shall last about 12 hours on a single charge (including maintenance/ replacement of battery to ensure continuous operations of the system)
Able to export the video footage or parts of it into portable storage device in a format which is playable on a Windows-based Computer.
Video footage shall include date/time stamp for the purpose of audit trail/evidence
Recording function
1Terabyte (TB) or Sufficient storage for about 15 days of video footage at Full HD resolution.
Option to record the footage at different frame rate to optimize the storage space.
General
The CCTV system shall ensure that recorded video is intact, cannot be altered and available for post event analysis.
If required, the Contractor shall retrieve and provide the video footages to PUB.
The Contractor shall not share any information or data with any third parties without PUBs approval.
